Bash(node -e "const fs = require(''fs''); const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(''vaults.json'')); console.log(''Accounts:'', data.accounts?.map(a => a.name).slice(0, 10) || ''No accounts found'');")

Bash(node -e "const fs = require(''''fs''''); const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(''''vaults.json'''')); const userBorrow = data.accounts.find(a => a.name === ''''UserBorrowPosition''''); console.log(JSON.stringify(userBorrow, null, 2));")
